net.kyori.text

Interface ScopedComponent<C extends Component>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - the component style
    All Superinterfaces:
    Component
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlockNbtComponent, EntityNbtComponent, KeybindComponent, ScoreComponent, SelectorComponent, TextComponent, TranslatableComponent

    public interface ScopedComponent<C extends Component>
extends Component
    Some magic to change return types.
